main event: While flying at 15,000 feet, an air crew observed a red object with a bluish green trail flash by from their right to left in a flat downward trajectory. It arched down and exploded with a greenish white flash.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for only 2 to 3 seconds., The object was reportedly traveling from southwest to northeast., The object produced a bright bluish white explosion upon termination., Air crew noted the object's appearance was comparable to the light of planet Venus when viewed at night., The air crew believed the object to be a meteor, different from other meteors observed during the flight.
sighted object: red object with a bluish green trail
location: Sea of Okhotsk, USSR - Japanese area
